section.title: Download
section.p: The Grinder 2 and The Grinder 3 can be downloaded from SourceForge.net. The files are packaged as zip format files which you should expand using unzip, WinZip or similar.

The Grinder 3 is distributed as two zip files. Everything required to run The Grinder is in the zip file labelled grinder-3.0-version.zip. The remaining files that are needed to build The Grinder are distributed in the zip file labelled grinder-3.0-version-src.zip; these are mainly of interest to developers wanting to extend The Grinder.

section.title: What else do I need?

tr.td: Java 2 Standard Edition 1.3, equivalent, or later
Java 2 Standard Edition 1.4, equivalent, or later
for SSL support with The Grinder 2 (see below)
to build The Grinder from source
to check the formatting of changes you may make to The Grinder

section.p: Later versions of these packages should also work.
section.note: JSSE (Java Secure Socket Extension) is a standard part of Java 2 Standard Edition 1.4.1 and later. To simplify SSL and HTTPS configuration, JSSE is now required for The Grinder 3. Consequently you may find it easier to use J2SE 1.4.1 with The Grinder 3.
